Hi, how do I install this mod? where do I copy it exactly? Also do I copy the whole folder Toolbar or just the files in gamedata?
Just like with any other KSP plugin. Take everything that's inside GameData\ and put it into your KSP installation's GameData\ folder.

Just like with any other KSP plugin. Take everything that's inside GameData\ and put it into your KSP installation's GameData\ folder.

You can also remove your game saves folder and do a clean install. Then put your game saves back in saves folder. Install mods as desired with clean copy of KSP. This only works if the update isn't a game breaker of course. And you need to reinstall all of your mods you had before but that's part of the point.

Do you use ATM? If so, go into GameData/BoulderCo/ActiveTextureManagerConfigs, open 000_Toolbar.cfg, and replace its contents with this:

ACTIVE_TEXTURE_MANAGER_CONFIG
{
	folder = 000_Toolbar
	enabled  = false
}
